data.title: Delhi Metro Rail Project-Salient Feature N Brief Description
data.meta_description: Delhi Metro Rail Project-Salient Feature n Brief Description - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The Delhi Metro Rail Project aims to provide an efficient mass transit system for Delhi to address the city's traffic congestion, pollution, and accidents. Phase I is currently under construction and consists of 3 lines totaling 65.11 km. Phases II-IV will expand the network to 244.86 km by 2021. The project utilizes various rail and construction technologies and is financed through loans, government investments, and tax exemptions. Once completed, the Delhi Metro will have the capacity to carry over 3.2 million passengers daily.
